summary: HD Texture replacer for highland cows.
descriptionHtml:
[center]This is a HD texture replacer for highland cows.

Another Retexture mod that replaces highland cows and cowhide. 

High res textures are 4x the original resolution.

Black version optional, mainfile is required.

When I saw the original textures for the first time I was really scared how bad they looked.
The eyes were just little black perls, the fur was just ugly and without any detail.
So I decided to make the cows look more realistic and more like real cows.

I used a lot of pictures and photography of scottish highland cattles to create this mod and get as close as possible to a realistic looking texture. 

[img]http://i80.photobucket.com/albums/j187/Eddi_01/trenner_zps0ae102f8.png[/img]

Install into \"skyrim/data/\" folder or use NMM.

Do not upload it elsewhere. 

[img]http://i80.photobucket.com/albums/j187/Eddi_01/trenner_zps0ae102f8.png[/img]

Cheers![/center]
author: Pfaffendrill

files.name: nord cattle - high res
files.changelogHtml:
no more shiny cows.
alpha edit for finer hair.
